search.title: What do you want to learn?

label.latest: The permanent address of the publication
label.version: The permanent address of the version

pid.tooltip: URN identifier (Uniform Resource Name) is a permanent, unique identifier that helps to discover, identify and link online materials and educational resources. You can use the identifier instead of a web address when you refer to or link to an educational resource.

versionHistory.helpText: In the Version history you can see the previous versions of the learning resource. A version is created every time the author uploads a new file and/or deletes or changes an existing one. Changes in descriptions and metadata are not saved in the Version history.

preview.noVideoSupport: Your browser does not support the video element.
preview.noAudioSupport: Your browser does not support the audio element.
preview.fileFormatNotSupported: The chosen file cannot be previewed. Please download the material to start using it.
preview.openInNewTab: Open educational material in a new tab

userReviews.title: User reviews
userReviews.feedbackPositive: What did you like about the material?
userReviews.feedbackSuggest: How could the material be developed?
userReviews.feedbackPurpose: How did you use the material as part of your teaching or learning?

socialMetadata.title: Users find that this learning resource is suitable also for:
socialMetadata.noMetadata: No user has yet added metadata. You can add your own by logging in.

reviews.title: User reviews

review.feedbackPositive: What did you like about the material?
review.feedbackSuggest: How could the material be developed?
review.feedbackPurpose: How did you use the material as part of your teaching or learning?

reviews.noRatings: The learning resource has no reviews yet.
reviews.ownerInfo: You cannot give reviews to your own learning resource. If you wish to change the metadata of your learning resource, you can do that with the edit-function on the top right corner of the page.

pattern.url: Please, provide http:// or https:// prefix

translations.label: Translations
translations.tooltip: With the Language Versions key you can add a Finnish, Swedish or English translation for the name and description of your resource. This will help users with these languages get a better understanding of your resource.

helpTexts.multipleItems: To add information to this field, write your content and press enter. In this way you can add several pieces of information.

files.alert: You can upload your OER or link it to the service with this form. In order to upload the OER you need to add information about it and choose a license. This information will help other users to find your OER and give them further information on how to use it. There is a small question mark(?) after each field that will give you additional information when needed. First upload or link your files and then proceed to the basic information section. You can add Finnish, Swedish or English translations for the name and description of your OER with the Language versions key. This will give users with different languages a  better understanding of your OER.

file.title: . file
file.tooltip: Download the files that comprise your learning resource. You can also link your learning resource if it is freely available with an open license and long life span. The first file will be the first to show on the preview.

language.label: Language
language.tooltip: Choose the language of your learning resource or part of the learning resource. If  you have versions of yourresource in different languages, you can download your files here and choose the language of study.

displayName.tooltip: The name for the file that you want other people to see. I.e. “Nature Ethics recording” or “Nature Ethics slideshow”. If your resource is comprised of multiple files, the preferred file is chosen by clicking on the name of the file. The name should be short and sweet.

file.error: Add at least one file or link

author.label: Author
author.tooltip: Author(s) of the resource. Enter the name(s) in the form of Surname, First Name.

affiliate.label: Affiliation
affiliate.tooltip: You can supplement your organization, i.e. school or project that you represent. Not a mandatory field. If your organization is not on the list, you can add your own by writing the word and clicking enter.

organization.label: Organization
organization.tooltip: Author(s) of the resource. Select your organization from the list or enter its name.

keywords.label: About
keywords.tooltip: Insert here the specific topics of your resource and/or the ways in which it is addressed. I.e. flipped learning, climate change, sociology of religion. If suitable words are not on the list, you can add your own by writing the word and clicking enter.

learningResourceTypes.label: Learning Resource Type
learningResourceTypes.tooltip: Choose the Type of your Learning Resource. You can choose multiple types if your resource is comprised of different parts.

educationalRoles.label: Educational Role
educationalRoles.tooltip: What is the main target group of your resource, for whom is it intended to. I.e. is it intended to be used by other teachers, learners or i.e. parents to give support in learning.

educationalUses.label: Educational Use
educationalUses.tooltip: Educational use of the resource in the context of learning. I.e. group work, independent study, OER sketch.

description.tooltip: Write a concise description of the resource: what does it contain, what is it about, for what educational purpose is it meant for.

common.suitsAllSubjects: Can be used in all educational subjects

educationalLevels.label: Educational Level
educationalLevels.tooltip: Choose the Educational Level of your resource. You can choose multiple levels if your resource is targeted at more than one Educational Levels, i.e. vocational education and upper secondary education.

subjects.label: Educational subject of early childhood education
subjects.tooltip: Educational subject of the resource. You can choose multiple Subjects.

objectives.label: Learning object of early childhood education
objectives.tooltip: Educational subject of the resource. You can choose multiple Subjects.

framework.label: Educational framework of early childhood education
framework.tooltip: You can add information about the educational framework of the learning resource in accordance to a curriculum or diploma.

subjects.tooltip: Educational subject of the resource. You can choose multiple Subjects.

framework.tooltip: You can add information about the educational framework of the learning resource in accordance to a curriculum or diploma.

framework.label: Educational framework of higher education
framework.tooltip: You can add information about the educational framework of the learning resource in accordance to a curriculum or diploma.

features.label: Accessibility Feature
features.tooltip: Here you can choose wether accessibility features such as captions, structural navigation or plain language have been taken into account in the learning resource. You will find additional information on accessibility in the FAQ section.

hazards.label: Accessibility Hazard
hazards.tooltip: Here you can choose if the learning resource contains elements that could prove to be hazardous to some people, i.e. if the resource contains flashing. If there source does not contain accessibility hazards you can choose i.e. no sound hazard. You will find additional information on accessibility in the FAQ section.

typicalAgeRange.label: Typical Age Range
typicalAgeRange.tooltip: Age range of the target group of the resource. I.e. 7-9, 18-90 yo.

timeRequired.label: Time Required
timeRequired.tooltip: An estimate of the time required to study the resource.

publisher.label: Publisher
publisher.tooltip: If the learning resource has a publisher, i.e. an organization or a school, you can supplement here the publishers official name.

expires.label: Expires
expires.tooltip: Add an expiration date for your resource if it is clearly foreseeable that the resource will not be up to date or relevant after a certain period.

prerequisites.label: Prerequisite
prerequisites.tooltip: You can add information about possible previous competences, tools, studies or knowledge that are required for the studying or utilizing of your resource.

addNew.tooltip: Here you can add materials and resources that you have utilized in the making of your own resource.

preview.title: Preview and save
preview.material-help: In here you can arrange the files of your learning resource by dragging them into the order in which you wish to exhibit them.

abort.text: Are you sure you want to cancel editing the educational material? Your changes will not be saved.

noPermission.title: Editing not permitted
noPermission.message: You are trying to edit a material for which you do not have the permission for. If you have uploaded this material, please check that you are using the correct login method.

noPermission.title: Editing not permitted
noPermission.message: You are trying to edit a collection for which you do not have the permission for. If you have created this collection, please check that you are using the correct login method.

abort.text: Are you sure you want to cancel editing the collection? Your changes will not be saved.

material.title: Resources
material.helpText: You can change the order of resources and headings by dragging them with a cursor.

addHeadingAndDescription.button: Add a heading and a description
addHeadingAndDescription.tooltip: You can add headings and descriptions to the learning resource to tell how to approach the collection, to add extra information on the subject or to structure the collection.

emails.subTitle: I would like to receive a notification when:
emails.newRatings: My educational resources gets new reviews
emails.almostExpired: The expires-date I have given to my educational resources is near

email.label: Email
email.confirm: We have sent you an email for you to verify that you want to get notifications from the Library of Open Educational Resources. Please verify your approval through the email.

allowTransfer.helpText: If you have logged in to the service by using Haka- or MPASSid-identification, the identification you use may change at some point (f.ex. when changing your workplace). With your new identification you cannot see the educational resources you have submitted with your previous identification in the My open educational resources view. On this page you can give us the permission to change the account tied to administering your learning resources in the case you contact us through the email you have given us above. To transfer your learning resources from one account to another, you always need to contact customer service, so a simple yes to the check box below does not lead to any action. If this situation is relevant to you now, please contact us at oppimateriaalivaranto@csc.fi and approve the check box below.
allowTransfer.label: The right to administer my learning resources can be transferred to another user of my choice if I contact you from the emailaddress I have given above

userMaterials.title: My open educational resources
userMaterials.noMaterials: You will see here the open educational resources you have shared. You have yet to share any OER. Press "Upload a new resource" and add your first OER.

results.noResults: Sorry, there are no results for this search. The search string might be too specific, try a more generic search or input a new search criteria.

name.label: Name of the collection
name.placeholder: Input a name for the collection

collections.noMaterials: You have not added any learning resources to your collection. When you find an interesting learning resource, click add to collection thus starting the growth of your collection.

addedToCollection.title: Collection has been updated
addedToCollection.message: The learning resources was added to the collection

removedFromCollection.title: Collection has been updated
removedFromCollection.message: Learning resources has been removed from the collection
